name: CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton
desc: A button in the style of the iOS text selection toolbar buttons.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton.onPressed} Called when this button is pressed. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: buttonItem
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton.onPressed} The buttonItem used to generate the button when using [CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton.buttonItem]. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: text
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton.text} The text used in the button's label when using [CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton.text]. {@endtemplate}
